Control.ttp: deThis page provides information related to Security Settings.
deThe username used for logging into the PAC.
deWhen checked, indicates no password is required for this user to login to the PAC.
deThe password used for logging into the PAC.
deThe password used for logging into the PAC. (Must match the password entered above.)
deWhen checkmarked, indicates that this user is currently enabled.
deDate and time this user was first added to the database.
deDate and time of the last modifications made to this user.
deLevel of access granted to this user.
deClick to display online help related to this page...
deClick to begin adding a new user...
deClick to indicate the selected user should be removed...
deClick to save the current user information to the database...
deClick to refresh the contents of this page...
deClick to collapse all the groups in the grid...
deClick to expand all the groups in the grid...
deThe username used for logging into the PAC
deIndicates the level of access granted to this user.
deThe date and time the user was added to the database.
deThe date and time of the last modification.
deIndicates whether the user is currently enabled or not.
deThe date and time the user last accessed the database via the corresponding IP Address.
deThe IP Address(es) the user accessed the database from.

Messages.Message: dePassword must be at least {0} characters in length.
deNew Password and Confirm Password must match.
deUsername must be at least {0} characters in length.
